item.title: A quick-start guide to the caret R package
item.description: A talk introducing the caret package, its basic uses, and a simple machine learning example using the palmerpenguins dataset. Given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2022. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Regex with R
item.description: Instructional talk covering basic examples of using regular expressions in R to improve the efficiency of data cleaning and metadata extraction tasks. Given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2021. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Introduction to Workflow Management with drake
item.description: Instructional talk covering the basics of writing functions in R and creating drake projects for documenting data analysis workflows. Attendees worked with an example dataset and participated in live coding activities to build a drake project from scratch. This was a half-day session over Zoom as part of WSU CEREO’s Reproducible Research Techniques with R workshop series. Syllabus available here.

item.title: Introduction to Mapping in R
item.description: Instructional talk on basics of manipulating and plotting spatial data in R using sf and ggplot2. Given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2021. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Introduction to Workflow Management with drake
item.description: Instructional talk covering the basics of writing functions in R and creating drake projects for documenting data analysis workflows. Attendees worked with an example dataset and participated in live coding activities to build a drake project from scratch. This was a half-day session over Zoom as part of WSU CEREO’s Reproducible Research Techniques with R workshop series. Syllabus available here.

item.title: Formatting Data for Use with R
item.description: Instructional talk covering strategies for formatting data for effective use with R given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2020. Link to blog post here.

item.title: R Markdown Introduction
item.description: Instructional talk on R Markdown given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2020. Link to previous blog post on the topic here.

item.title: R Shiny Introduction
item.description: Instructional talk on the Shiny R package given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2020. Link to blog post here.

item.title: An Introduction to Working with Lists Using purrr
item.description: Instructional talk on the basics of map() and related functions from the purrrpackage in R and how to effectively do analysis using data in lists. Given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2020. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Advanced Methods with ggplot2
item.description: Instructional talk on advanced applications of ggplot2 given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2019. Link to blog post here.

item.title: R Markdown Introduction
item.description: Instructional talk on R Markdown given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2019. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Tips on Cleaning Scripts and Data in R
item.description: Instructional talk on script and data cleaning in R given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2019. Link to blog post here.

item.title: R Shiny Introduction
item.description: Instructional talk on the Shiny R package given at the WSU R Working Group, Pullman, WA in 2018. Link to blog post here.

item.title: Influence of fire history and soil legacies on coast redwood stand structure and composition
item.description: Talk given at the Coast Redwood Science Symposium, Eureka, CA in 2016.

item.title: Influence of fire history and soil legacies on coast redwood regeneration and stand structure
item.description: Talk given at the Ecological Society of America Annual Meeting in Fort Lauderdale, FL in 2016.

item.title: Plant-pollinator interactions in a Northwest arum are influenced by plant traits, not riparian forest management
item.description: Talk given at Northwest Scientific Association Annual Meeting in 2014.

item.title: Split Between Two Worlds: The Land and Sea Archaeological Sites of Chuuk Lagoon and Implications for Cultural Change in Micronesia
item.description: Talk given at Archaeological Institute of America/American Philological Association Annual Meeting in 2014.
